ministry.name: Fishes & Loaves Meals Ministry
ministry.overview: The meals ministry helps provide food for those who just had a new child, are going through a crisis, or acquired a sudden illness.

long-description.heading: Meals
long-description.p: Help provide and deliver meals to people at Calvary who have just had a new child, death in the family or sudden illness and are not able cook for themselves during these crisis times.
